name: MasterRunners
summary:
Welcome to the MasterRunners Page.

MasterRunners is a free-to-play multiplayer hand based movement game surrounding a variety of entertaining gamemodes, cosmetics, obstacles, etc.

With over 10+ gamemodes and an active player count of 100,000+, we guarantee this game is worth your time. We have lots to offer, so what are you waiting for!?

What you can do:
Play Gamemodes with players across the WORLD. MasterRunners can be played worldwide and with our advanced multiplayer system, you can enjoy...
